introduction: An important anniversary, Paolo Fresu's 60th birthday, is the occasion for a great event: a concert held in the historical rooms of the Archiginnasio in Bologna, the ancient seat of the University and historical library that preserves unique and precious books and manuscripts. Paolo Fresu celebrates his birthday accompanied by great musicians who alternate in different formations that range over different musical atmospheres. The film-concert is the chronicle of this unrepeatable event that has an exceptional guide in Alessandro Bergonzoni and his poetic and fantastic words.
